duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely operate a collection truck to collect waste and/or recycling along a designated route and transfer to a disposal site.
Work closely with Dispatch, your Supervisor, and the rest of the driver team to service our customers on different routes and schedules.
Load/unload waste and/or recycling materials at landfills, recycling centers, or similar facilities.
Perform pre- and post-trip inspection of your vehicle to ensure truck is in proper working order and address maintenance issues quickly.
Follow all required safety policies and report any safety or employee experience issues to leadership.
